cast.overview: Kim Sun-woo is an enforcer and manager for a hotel owned by a cold, calculative crime boss, Kang who assigns Sun-woo to a simple errand while he is away on a business trip; to shadow his young mistress, Hee-soo, for fear that she may be cheating on him with a younger man with the mandate that he must kill them both if he discovers their affair.
cast.title: A Bittersweet Life

details.biography: Kim Ji-hoon (김지훈) was a South Korean singer, actor, television personality.  He was a former member of the groups Gang, Two Two, and Duke.  He committed suicide in 2013.
details.name: Kim Ji-hoon
